must_have: I'm not really sure what's important
nice_to_have: Automatic refills every month without needing to ask
Choice of generic vs. brand name medication
Ability to schedule a specific pickup time
Ability to request refills through a mobile app
deal_breakers: The medication has severe side effects I'm concerned about
Pharmacy is out of stock for my medication

technical: Something modern that integrates with my phone
I think a good performance means it should refill quickly
Maybe it needs to have some kind of tech support, not sure
non_technical: I heard customer service is important but not sure why
It should be convenient but also feel personal

must_meet: The prescription must be filled, but I might want it to be fast and slow at the same time
should_meet: It should be available through a mobile app, although I don't really use apps much
nice_to_meet: I think I would like the option for automatic refills, but I’m not sure if that’s a good idea
